actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to reduce paperwork in the administration of certain construction contract provisions of law relating to wage rates.

summary.text: Amends the Act of June 13, 1934, to require contractors and sub-contractors who work on federally-financed public projects to submit notarized statements regarding wages paid during the contract or subcontract period only at the beginning and end of such period (not weekly, as currently required).

titles.title: A bill to reduce paperwork in the administration of certain construction contract provisions of law relating to wage rates.
